author: fielding
msg: OS/2 EMX library's select() isn't thread safe so bypass it and go direct to
the OS/2 API call. Unfortunately this only works on socket handles which will
break probe_writable_fds() so I'll have to find a way to fix that too.

author: fielding
msg: Changes for thread safety in pthreads.
